name: CloudFlare but Dark
description: Something something, CloudFlare blinds me, this fixes it.
additional_info:
Release notes:
    4/14/2016 3:53P PST: Changes to several modals in the "Add Domain" menu


Known Bugs: 
    -When adding a domain, step 4 of the domain registration process has incorrectly formatted text that makes the text white. No known fix at the moment.
